mapper.select: select CCODE, CNAME, CURL, CPARENT, CSEQ, CDEPTH, CUSEYN from CATEGORY order by CPARENT, CSEQ, CDEPTH asc
insert category (cname, curl, cparent, cseq, cdepth, cuseyn) select #{name} ,null , max(cparent)+1 , null, null, #{useyn} from category;
mapper.insert: insert into CATEGORY(CNAME, CURL, CPARENT, CSEQ, CDEPTH, CUSEYN) values (#{name}, #{url}, #{parent}, #{seq}, #{depth}, #{useyn})
